items.name: coderabbit-types
items.title: CodeRabbit Types
items.description: Pure TypeScript types for CodeRabbit API integration. Framework-agnostic type definitions with zero dependencies.

items.name: coderabbit-client
items.title: CodeRabbit API Client
items.description: Framework-agnostic CodeRabbit API client. Works in Node.js, Deno, Bun, Edge runtimes, and browsers. Single endpoint for generating developer activity reports with 10-minute timeout support.
items.docs: Set CODERABBIT_API_KEY environment variable or pass apiKey in config. Get API key from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan subscription).

items.name: coderabbit-storage-adapter
items.title: CodeRabbit Storage Adapter Interface
items.description: TypeScript interface for implementing custom storage backends. Implement this to add support for any database: Convex, Supabase, Prisma, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, localStorage, IndexedDB, or in-memory storage.

items.name: coderabbit-storage-memory
items.title: CodeRabbit In-Memory Storage
items.description: In-memory storage adapter for testing and development. Reports are lost when process restarts. Perfect for ephemeral use cases and unit tests.

items.name: coderabbit-storage-localstorage
items.title: CodeRabbit LocalStorage Adapter
items.description: Browser localStorage adapter for client-side report persistence. Perfect for testing, prototyping, and browser-based applications. Reports persist across page reloads.

items.name: coderabbit-storage-convex
items.title: CodeRabbit Convex Storage
items.description: Convex database adapter with real-time sync and auth support. Includes schema definitions for the reports table with indexes for efficient queries.
items.docs: Import coderabbitReportsTable in your convex/schema.ts and add as 'coderabbit_reports' table. Pass ConvexReactClient instance and api to ConvexStorageAdapter constructor.

items.name: coderabbit-react
items.title: CodeRabbit React Hook
items.description: React hook for generating CodeRabbit reports with built-in loading and error states. Works with any storage adapter or no storage at all. Supports success/error callbacks.

items.name: coderabbit-form
items.title: CodeRabbit Report Form
items.description: Full-featured form component for collecting report parameters. Includes template selection, custom prompts, filters, grouping, and advanced options with progressive disclosure. Pipe-separated values for arrays.

items.name: coderabbit-branding
items.title: CodeRabbit Branding
items.description: Framework-agnostic CodeRabbit logo and icon components. Accepts theme as prop ('light' or 'dark'). Works with Next.js, Remix, Vite, or any React environment. Includes SVG assets.

items.name: coderabbit-all
items.title: CodeRabbit Complete Integration
items.description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with all components, hooks, storage adapters, and branding. One-command installation for full-featured developer activity reporting. Includes client, React hook, form, all storage adapters (memory, localStorage, Convex), and framework-agnostic branding.
items.docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). For Convex storage, import coderabbitReportsTable in convex/schema.ts and add as 'coderabbit_reports' table. See individual component docs for usage examples.
